resources.string: Prayer Alarm for prophet Mohammed pace be upon him
Indeed, Allah showers His blessings upon the Prophet, and His angels pray for him. O believers! Invoke Allah’s blessings upon him, and salute him with worthy greetings of peace. Al-Ahzab verse 56.
Choose the duration of the reminder
Developed by: The poor servant of God \n Ahmed Mohammed Elzubair \n Prayers for me and my parents for success, mercy and forgiveness if we leave this simple face
This an android app for reminding you to pray on the Messenger and the servant of God, peace be upon him
